attributes.action: Law for Philanthropic Lobbying of Communities rather than Politicians & Parties.
attributes.additional_details:
For too long our leaders and administrators have been subjected to undue influences from corporations, powerful individuals, countries and others. 

This distracts and distorts the good and unbiased intentions of government. 

We propose that should any body seek to influence, then the only means available should be via direct acts of philanthropy towards communities & services. 

By enriching society directly those seeking influence can have their causes supported by the democratic process only
attributes.background:
We the people call for the direct lobbying of MP’s, Politicians, Civil Servants and their families & associations to be made a criminal offence. 

if an industry, individual, body, religion or company wishes to seek favour then it should only be able to do so via community philanthropy.

rejection.details: It's not clear what you mean by 'direct lobbying' and 'lobbying via community philanthropy'.
